name: Pula: The Other Side BETA
description:
Pula is a top-down 2D shooter game that has multiplayer and singleplayer. The game is still in development and it still has bugs and a short story. After we make 1.0 version we promise that we will fix all of these problems :).

Pula: the other side is a expansion pack of a game Pula. We reccomend that you finish the story of Pula first so you can understant this story because it doesn't have a incroduction so if you don't play Pula first you won't understand the story.
